p: It is well known that oxidative stress is caused by reactive oxygen species (ROS) and plays an important role in the pathogenesis of various degenerative diseases, such as diabetes; similarly, postprandial oxidative stress is associated with a higher risk for diabetes, and therefore, H. persicum can be used as a potent antioxidant and as a strong inhibitor of Î±-amylase in the improvement of type 2 diabetes patients [ 443].
